item.description:
Dale has posted this idea for Easter Sunday.  Panera will still be open until 4pm, but those that want can attend this function.  RSVP by Sunday, April 10th and payments to Dale (at the meet-up) no later than by Sunday, April 17th.  We need to have at least 8 - 10 people to reserve a table.  Check our Message Board for the complete menu and other particulars. 

MENU

Juices, Granola, Salads, Smoked Seafood Station, Buffet  Matzo, Brie, LEO, Scrambled Eggs, Frittata, Home Fries, Salmon, Vegetable Hash, Fresh Fruit ... and much, much more.

COST:

Adults 13 and over $20.00

Advanced payment required & checks made payable to:  Ahavath Torah Congregation
item.name: Passover Jazz Brunch
